definition: obstructed/to fail/to oppress/to repress/to lower the tone/to bend back/to dampen
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
setback/reverse/check/defeat/frustration/disappointment/to frustrate/to discourage/to set sb back/to blunt/to subdue

a transition (stop and change) in spoken sound, music or in brush strokes/a cadence/punctuated by a transition/with syncopated cadence (brush stroke in painting)

devastating setback/slump (in stock market etc)/crushing defeat/to cause a serious setback/to plummet

sentences.english: To humble his pride, we made a plan.
sentences.chinese: 爲了挫他的傲氣，我們制定了一個計劃。

sentences.english: Where are Mark and Kathleen in this story?
sentences.chinese: 馬克與凱薩琳正在夜市裏喫挫冰。

definition: penis/(slang) cool or extraordinary/(Cantonese) to fuck
clown/2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox/ancient Chinese compass point: 30°
